name: ON
description: Use this command to transfer control to a line label depending on a value. This is almost like a flat CASE command.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The value to test. Must resolve to a numeric value.

parameters.name: GOTO/GOSUB
parameters.description: GOTO or GOSUB to the appropriate line.

parameters.name: line_label_list
parameters.description: The list of line labels used to determine where to transfer control. The first label corresponds to a value of 1, the second to 2, etc. If the expression resolves to a value of 0 or greater than the number of labels -1 then control is transferred to the last label in the list. The line labels are separated by commas.
